task: Record a USD 10 transport expense by selecting the 交通 category, entering the amount, and adding a note about the trip.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the transport expense is successfully recorded, showing the amount and category in the expense list.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "交通"

The button labeled "交通" remains visible, but several new widgets have appeared, including a "backButton," a "收入" button, and a selected button labeled "支出." Additionally, new text views and dropdown fields have been introduced, indicating a change in the available options and context for the user.
